title: Script Test Harness Template
description: Template for general script execution tests
template:
#!/bin/bash
# URN: {urn}

# Given
{given_setup}

# When
start_time=$(date +%s)
output=$({script_command} {script_args} 2>&1)
exit_code=$?
end_time=$(date +%s)
duration=$((end_time - start_time))

# Then
if [ $exit_code -eq {expected_exit_code} ]; then
  status="PASS"
else
  status="FAIL"
fi

echo "{\"urn\":\"{urn}\",\"status\":\"$status\",\"details\":{\"exit_code\":$exit_code,\"duration_seconds\":$duration}}"

[ "$status" == "PASS" ]
